definition: to proofread and correct/to edit and rectify/to correct/to calibrate
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Image distortion correction includes spatial correction and gray-level correction.
sentences.chinese: 圖像畸變校正包括空間位置校正和灰度校正。

sentences.english: Image distortion correction includes spatial correction and gray-level correction.
sentences.chinese: 圖像畸變校正包括空間位置校正和灰度校正。

sentences.english: Use the ZPE (zero point energy) , revise the whole energy.
sentences.chinese: 對於單點能採用零點能校正。

sentences.english: The deviation made by the wind could be straightened by the computer.
sentences.chinese: 由風引起的偏差可由計算機予以校正。

sentences.english: Corrected some of the proportions in Paintshop.
sentences.chinese: 用了電腦軟體校正了一些比例。

sentences.english: In excess skewness the correction may be turning.
sentences.chinese: 偏斜度超過規定時，可採用車削校正。

sentences.english: The results of calibration for PIV measurement of Taylor-Couette flow are successful.
sentences.chinese: 並應用於泰勒一庫埃特流測量的校正。

sentences.english: This also suitable for the prepress system only allow one calibration curve.
sentences.chinese: 這也適用於那些只支持一條校正曲線的印前流程。

sentences.english: Non-sew roll, which is warped with wearable rubber, with dynamitic balance adjustment .
sentences.chinese: 無縫管，包裹耐磨橡膠，並做動平衡校正。

sentences.english: Adjusting control system with Bode diagram has been a common method in certain fields, but remains a new subject .
sentences.chinese: 用伯德圖校正控制系統，在某些部門已是常用的方法。

sentences.english: The error of magnetic compass is not adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 磁羅經的誤差沒有校正。

sentences.english: The single point calibration curve method is used for the quantitative determination.
sentences.chinese: 兩種方法均採用一點校正曲線法定置。

sentences.english: User input may be used to adjust filtering and tokenization of the messages.
sentences.chinese: 用戶輸入的內容可能會用於校正過濾和用於標記消息。

sentences.english: The vice-adviser advised the reviser to devise a device forgetting rid of vice.
sentences.chinese: 代辦參謀倡議校正者想出一個剷除惡習的計謀。

sentences.english: Let’s take the adjustments one step further.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們將這種校正更進一步。

definition: to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
to adjust to the right value/to tune/to focus (a camera etc)/to set (the date, the time) to the correct value
to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
base (of a triangle)/base line (in geodetic survey)/horizontal
to correct/to rectify (e.g. a physical defect such as hearing or vision)/to cure/rectification/correction/to straighten
